translations: n.规格说明（specification 的简称）；投机，碰运气（on spec）；<非正式>眼镜（specs）
v.给……定规格，按照规定标准建造

sentences.sentence: We want the machine manufactured to our own spec.
sentences.translation: 我们要求这台机器按我们自己的规格来制造。

sentences.sentence: This is useful on test or development environments that are installed on laptops or low-spec systems with 4 GB or less of RAM.
sentences.translation: 这对于安装在笔记本电脑或者内存不多于 4 GB 的低规格系统中的测试或开发环境很有用。

sentences.sentence: The standard spec includes stainless steel holding tanks.
sentences.translation: 标准设计包括不锈钢存储器。
